content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it for a month. I am willing to negotiate with you on the rental price. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euros for 25 square meters. Can we sign a contract soon?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Nesibe. I am willing to accept your proposed rental price of 500 Euros for the 25 square meter apartment. I can provide you with a contract to sign as soon as possible. Would you like me to prepare it for you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, please. Can I pay you in cash or should I transfer the money to your account?

Also, when can I move in? Can you tell me the date when the apartment becomes available?

Lastly, do I have to pay any additional fees or charges for renting the apartment?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Of course, Nesibe. You can pay me in cash or transfer the money to my account. Please let me know your preference.

As for the move-in date, the apartment will become available on the 1st of next month. You can move in on that day.

Regarding additional fees or charges, there are no extra costs for renting the apartment. The rental price of 500 Euros per month is all you have to pay. However, please note that utilities such as electricity, water, and gas are not included in the rental price and will be billed separately.
name: Heinrich Heine
